answers.question: What medical services are provided to refugees?
answers.answer: Free consultations are provided by a family doctor, psychologist, and gynecologist to refugees from Ukraine and other countries.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: Where are these medical services offered?
answers.answer: These medical services are offered at RomExpo, located at Meresti Boulevard 65-67, Bucharest 011465. This is where the center of assistance for refugees from Ukraine is currently situated.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How can someone schedule an appointment?
answers.answer: To get an appointment with a doctor, you must first make an appointment with the IOM representatives. Their office is located within RomExpo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: When are the services available?
answers.answer: The services are available Monday through Friday, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.question: What language assistance is provided?
answers.answer: All doctors are English speakers. Additionally, free assistance from a translator can be requested.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.
